p.d: In addition to being a cheese collector, Geronimo Stilton is the editor of "Rodent Echo", the most-read newspaper in Sourisia. His sister Téa, the paper's intrepid foreign correspondent, leads him on incredible adventures all over the world. Directed by: Davide Veca, Nicolas Blard, Frédérick Chaillou, Niccolo Sacchi (season 3, France/Italy, 2016) Based on books by Elisabetta Dami
